about_the_game: Have you ever wanted to create a blue monkey? Or how about a giraffe with a mohawk? Now you can! Try the Animal Creator and start creating animals for your very own zoo!
detailed_description: Have you ever wanted to create a blue monkey? Or how about a giraffe with a mohawk? Now you can! Try the Animal Creator and start creating animals for your very own zoo!
name: World of Zoo: Animal Creator Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS: Microsoft Windows XP/Vista
  • Processor: Intel Pentium IV processor running at 2 GHz, AMD 64, Core 2 duo 1.6Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM (1 GB RAM on Vista)
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 6600 GT or ATI Radeon x1600 with at least 64MB of memory (video cards with Pixel Shader version 1.1 or better are required)
  • Display: DirectX-compatible display capable of 800x600 resolution in 16-bit color
  • DirectX®: DirectX 9.0c and above
  • Hard Drive: 2GB of hard drive space
  • Sound: Sound: 16-bit Sound Blaster Compatible

short_description: Have you ever wanted to create a blue monkey? Or how about a giraffe with a mohawk? Now you can! Try the Animal Creator and start creating animals for your very own zoo!
supported_languages: Danish, Dutch, English, French, German, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Swedish
